channel.title: CVE Feed for WPPOOL -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPPOOL -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-34375|2024-05-06T18:28:14.610Z -- WPPOOL -- Sheets To WP Table Live Sync
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPPOOL Sheets To WP Table Live Sync allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Sheets To WP Table Live Sync: from n/a through 3.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30437|2024-03-29T17:22:36.216Z -- WPPOOL -- Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPPOOL Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Webinar and Video Conference with Jitsi Meet: from n/a through 2.6.3.
